openadk.library.impl
Class ProfilerUtils

java.lang.Object
  openadk.library.impl.ProfilerUtils

public class ProfilerUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utilities for interacting with the SIFProfilerClient when support for the Edustructures SIF Profiling Harness is enabled.

ProfilerUtils

Method Detail

startProfiling

public static void startProfiling(int sessionId,
                                  ObjectTypeCodes otcImpl)
Called by the agent when it is ready to initialize the SIFProfilerClient instance of the ADK. This must be done after the agent has learned the Session ID to associate with all recorded metrics.

setProfilerName

public static void setProfilerName(java.lang.String name)
Sets the profiler name.

This method is called by the Agent class upon initialization.

Parameters:
name - The string that identifies the SIFProfilerClient instance for the ADK, which may differ from other components being profiled. The name must be unique among all SIFProfilerClient instances.

getProfilerName

public static java.lang.String getProfilerName()
Gets the profiler name.

Returns:
The string that identifies the SIFProfilerClient instance for the ADK, which may differ from other components being profiled. The name must be unique among all SIFProfilerClient instances.

setProfilerSessionId

public static void setProfilerSessionId(int id)
Sets the profiler name.

This method is called by the Agent class upon initialization.

Parameters:
name - The string that identifies the SIFProfilerClient instance for the ADK, which may differ from other components being profiled. The name must be unique among all SIFProfilerClient instances.
